name: d.Evil
description:
The desire for more power, hatred towards powers of good drives you into arms of demonic gifts, which corrupt you further and further.

Choose one of 3 classes, assemble your equipment and start a battle against the warriors of light. Collect the orbs and spend them on better demonic artifacts to grow stronger and beyond. On top of these is a high score that you can try to crack.

But beware, the next best Demonic Artifacts won't improve you without charging a price. So you might to vary the equipment to better compete against the hordes of enemies. Choose between 3 sets of equipment. Each class represents a different attribute: strength, wisdom and precision.
